message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand you're interested in the product, but $90 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm still a bit hesitant to go down to $95, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $105. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to pay $98 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm still not willing to go down to $98, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $102. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $99 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, but I still need to make a bit more profit. I'll offer it to you for $101. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
I'm willing to meet you at $100. That's the maximum I'm willing to pay. Will you accept?
